content: I am currently a software engineer in an enterprise level company looking for the next challenge in my career. I would describe myself as enthusiastic, sociable, and a driven team player. I am always looking to learn and develop, especially through facing difficult challenges. I take pride in helping out wherever I can to ensure goals are met and I am not shy about asking for help and guidance. My long terms goals are to be involved in the renewable energy sector and to see Max Verstappen win the championship
